clinical_study.brief_title: Imaging Study of Lead Implant for His Bundle Pacing
clinical_study.official_title: Imagining Study of Lead Implant for His Bundle Pacing

lead_sponsor.agency: Medtronic Cardiac Rhythm and Heart Failure

clinical_study.source: Medtronic Cardiac Rhythm and Heart Failure

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this research study is to assess the implant success proportion of the Medtronic SelectSecure MRI SureScan Model 3830 pacing lead at the bundle of His for His bundle pacing.

detailed_description.textblock: The study will evaluate implant lead electrical measurements and changes over time, estimate the correlation between lead location and selective vs non-selective His bundle pacing, and estimate the correlation between long-term lead performance and implant characteristics. Data from the study may be used to standardize the implant workflow to help improve the ease and predictability of His bundle pacing implants.

primary_outcome.description: To determine the proportion implant successes from all subjects who undergo an implant attempt of a lead at the bundle of His for His bundle pacing. Implant success will be defined as the presence of a H wave on the implanted lead EGM and a His-bundle pacing capture threshold equal to or less than 2.5V at 1.0ms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Association between the lead position and selective vs. nonselective HBP occurrence at implant
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the relationship between lead position (anterior septum, mid septum, posterior septum) and His-bundle pacing selectivity (selective vs. non-selective)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in His-bundle pacing capture thresholds over time
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate His-bundle pacing capture threshold from implant to 12 months
To evaluate impedance from implant to 12 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in R-wave amplitude over time
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate R-wave amplitude from implant to 12 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in QRS duration over time
secondary_outcome.description: Intrinsic QRS duration measured prior to implant procedure and compared to measurements during follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Association between lead location and long-term lead electrical performance
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the association between lead location and long-term lead electrical performance defined by the His-bundle pacing capture threshold at 12 months post-implant.

secondary_outcome.measure: Correlation between His-bundle pacing capture threshold at implant and long-term lead electrical performance
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the correlation between His-bundle pacing capture threshold at implant and long-term lead electrical performance defined by the His-bundle pacing capture threshold at 12 months post-implant.

secondary_outcome.measure: Correlation between paced QRS duration at implant and long-term lead electrical performance
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the correlation between paced QRS duration at implant and long-term lead electrical performance defined by the His-bundle pacing capture threshold at 12 months post-implant.

secondary_outcome.measure: Complications related to the procedure or the lead for His bundle pacing
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse events that are complications related to the procedure or the lead for His bundle pacing will be summarized

arm_group.description: Patient will be implanted per indications for single or dual chamber pacemaker. Lead for His bundle pacing will be implanted.

intervention.description: Medtronic SelectSecure SureScan MRI model 3830 lead

study_pop.textblock: Bradycardia patients, AV Block patients, Sinus Node Dysfunction patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject has a Class I or II indication for implantation of an implantable pacemaker
- Subject (or legally authorized representative) has signed and dated the study-specific Consent Form
- Subject is 18 years of age or older, or is of legal age to give informed consent per local and national law
- Subject is expected to remain available for follow-up visits
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject is contraindicated for Cardiac CT
- Subject has an existing or prior pacemaker, ICD or CRT device implant
- Subject is intended to receive an implant of a LV lead or CRT device
- Subject life expectancy is less than 1 year
- Pregnant women or breastfeeding women, or women of child bearing potential and who are not on a reliable form of birth regulation method or abstinence
- Subjects with exclusion criteria required by local law (e.g. age or other)
- Subject with a medical condition that precludes the patient from participation in the opinion of the investigator
- Subject is enrolled in a concurrent study that may confound the results of this study.
